misconfigurations.scenario: User wants to migrateTB or PB scale data to aws, but has a slow network
misconfigurations.recommendation_action:
use AWS SNOW family: 
- 0-8TB usable, snowcone
- 0-80TB usable, snowball
- <100PB snowmobile
misconfigurations.recommendation_description_detailed: common scenarios: data center migration / decommision, disater recovery, etc.
